network.name: Network Name
network.addNetworkDescription: Add a custom network to use Plug on test networks.

profile.wantToConnect: Do you want to connect your accounts?
profile.accountNameTooLong: Account name must be less than 24 characters long

activity.noActivityText:
When you deposit, send, or swap,
your activity will be displayed here.

apps.title: Connected Apps
apps.disconnectText: Are you sure you want to disconnect from
apps.emptyText: When you connect to an app they will be displayed here, with the ability to remove them.
apps.comingSoonSubtitle:
Plug will allow you to connect
and log into IC Apps.

login.title: Welcome Back!
login.subtitle: Plug into the Internet Computer
login.import: Import using your Secret Recovery Phrase

settings.title: Settings
settings.walletDetailsDescription: Change the name & pic on your account.
settings.contactsDescription: Add, edit, remove and manage contacts.
settings.seedPhraseDescription: View and backup your secret phrase.
settings.resetAccountDescription: Reset all Transactions and Linked Apps.
settings.exportIdentityDescription: Get a pem file to use in DFX.
settings.networkDescription: Add, edit, and remove custom networks.

walletDetails.title: Account Details
walletDetails.name: Name
walletDetails.principalIdDescription: It is your main unique identifier on the Internet Computer, and your wallet's main address in Plug.
walletDetails.accountIdDescription: An Account ID is an address derived from your Principal ID, that represents your ICP balance on the ledger.
walletDetails.icnsDescription: An ICNS name maps your wallet ID to a human readable name (ex. 'plug.icp'). Once set, you can send and receive tokens & NFT's to your ICNS name in addition to your wallet ID.

seedPhrase.title: Secret Recovery Phrase
seedPhrase.checkbox: I will be safe with my Secret Recovery Phrase.

appConnection.connect: wants to connect to your wallet

deposit.title: Deposit
deposit.runCommandSubtitle: To deposit Cycles from a Cycles Wallet you need to run a DFX CLI command.
deposit.depositIcpSubtitle1: Use when receiving from Plug accounts or other apps that support sending directly to Principal ID's.
deposit.depositIcpTitle2: From Exchange, DFX, or Account ID
deposit.depositIcpSubtitle2: Use when receiving from exchanges or other apps that only support sending to Account ID's.
deposit.sameAddressFromTo: Oops! You're trying to send to your own ID

swap.title: Swap
swap.comingSoonSubtitle: Currently you can only swap from ICP to Cycles within the Plug Wallet.

send.title: Send
send.inputId: Enter Principal ID or Account ID
send.canisterDetected: We detected the recipient ID you entered is a Canister, please choose where you want the cycles to go.
send.accountWarning:
You can‚Äôt send cycles to an Account ID. 
 Please enter a Principal ID or Canister ID.
send.canisterDetectedIcp1: We detected the recipient ID you entered is a Canister. Please be aware that although you can send ICP to a canister,
send.canisterDetectedIcp2: currently there is no way to send ICP out of a canister.
send.canisterDetectedUnderstand: I understand. Send ICP to canister anyways.
send.icnsModalText: Plug supports ICNS when it comes to .icp name resolution. Make sure to double check you're sending to the correct name.
send.icnsModalButton2: Learn more about the two ID's
send.doNotClose: Don't click away from this screen for a few seconds while your transaction is being sent to the network. If you do your tx won't be processed.
send.xtcCanisterDetected: We detected the recipient ID you entered is a Canister, please confirm what you want to send.
send.xtcModalText: If you want to send cycles to a canister to top/refill it and pay for its computation, select Raw Cycles. Otherwise, pick 'keep as XTC' if you want the canister to own a balance of tokenized cycles (XTC).

transfer.withdraw: wants to withdraw from your wallet
transfer.notEnoughText: You don't have enough {token} in your wallet to process this transaction. Please get more {token} to continue.

welcome.createText: Create a new wallet and Secret Recovery Phrase.
welcome.importText: Import using 12 word Secret Recovery Phrase from an existing Plug wallet.
welcome.welcomeSubtitle: Choose if you want to import or create a wallet (Principal ID).
welcome.passwordSubtitle: Please create a password to access your Plug extension.
welcome.passwordWarning: Don't forget your password, otherwise you'll need to reimport your wallet using your Secret Recovery Phrase.
welcome.importSubtitle: Please enter your 12 word Secret Recovery Phrase.
welcome.memeSubtitle: Peep your extensions and Plug should be there.
welcome.seedSubtitle: Below is the Secret Recovery Phrase for your new wallet, write it down.
welcome.seedCheckbox: I wrote down the Secret Recovery Phrase and put it somewhere safe.
welcome.pasteMnemonic: You can paste the totality of your secret phrase into any input

contacts.title: Contacts
contacts.description: Name your addresses for a better, safer, more fun experience.
contacts.name: Name
contacts.id: Principal, Account ID or ICNS name
contacts.deleteText: Are you sure you want to delete

addToken.title: Add Token
addToken.searchText: Add tokens to your wallet, verified tokens will appear in the search.
addToken.confirmText: Token Safety Alert: For your security, make sure to do proper research before interacting with any token.
addToken.dabText: Helping improve discoverability, reputation, and trust in IC tokens.
addToken.invalidInterfaceTokenError: Wrong standard. No Token Interface Detected.
addToken.nftTokenError: Custom non-fungible tokens are not supported yet.
addToken.importTitle: wants to add a token to your wallet

addNFT.title: Add NFT
addNFT.searchText: Add NFT's to your wallet, verified NFT's will appear in the search.
addNFT.confirmText: NFT Safety Alert: For your security, make sure to do proper research before interacting with any NFT.
addNFT.dabText: Helping improve discoverability, reputation, and trust in IC tokens.
addNFT.invalidInterfaceTokenError: Wrong standard. No Token Interface Detected.
addNFT.importTitle: wants to add a NFT to your wallet

removeToken.mainText: Are you sure you want to delete
removeToken.disclaimer: You can always add the token back by adding it as a custom token again.

100.description: This transaction couldn‚Äôt be completed because there are insufficient funds available.

300.description: We‚Äôre sorry, something weird happened. Return home and retry the action.

whitelist.title: wants permission to use these canisters:

exportIdentity.title: Export DFX Identity
exportIdentity.checkbox: I will be safe with my DFX identity.
exportIdentity.runCommandDescription: In order to use your account in DFX, run the following command, using the .pem file download as route.
exportIdentity.dfxImport: dfx identity import <identity name> <route to pem>

importPem.fileNotSupported: File not supported. Try a different file.

nfts.transferError: Something went wrong while attempting to send the NFT
nfts.emptyTitle: You don't own any NFTs yet
nfts.emptyText: When you do, they'll show here, where you will see their traits and send them.

burn.title: wants to transfer cycles to a canister

warning.actions: wants to perform the following actions:
warning.title: Important Warning
warning.description: This app is interacting with your assets in an unsafe way, without providing a way for Plug (or you) to see what it's doing. Make sure you fully trust this app before confirming, otherwise you could lose your assets.
warning.modalText: Because this app is not showing you what it's doing (unsafe), which means you (and Plug) can't read the arguments

clock.title: Your device clock is set incorrectly
clock.description: Your device's clock is incorrect and this affects how Plug can communicate with the IC due to its security measures. Set your clock's time to automatic and restart your browser.
